title: Now You Don't
description: Janine Murray’s inherited Romanov treasures valued at ten million dollars are stolen from the home vault, and she wonders—could her husband be the culprit? Janine turns to Kevin Shank, an Iraqi veteran and unorthodox security consultant to determine the truth. Shank’s investigation triggers the murder of his friend and he finds himself the target of police, thieves, and Russian operatives.
author: William H. Lovejoy
